Tutorial – Using pygcam¶

Note

This tutorial is currently under development!

Setting up a GCAM experiment¶

Configuration¶

See also

The configuration API and default variable settings are described in pygcam.config

  • First run creates ~/.pygcam.cfg
  • Required parameters

GCAM: main user workspace and ModelInterface¶

  • Location of GCAM package
  • xmlsrc, local-xml, dyn-xml

Project structure¶

  • XML files
  • scenarios.py

Running a GCAM experiment¶

Run-time structure:

  • SandboxRoot
    • figure showing sandbox structure

  • Create a file project.xml (template ...)

  • Use the run sub-command of gt (GCAM tool)

    • Hint: use -l, -L, and -g to list steps, scenarios, and groups
    • Choose steps, scenarios, groups to run using -s, -S, and -g flags, and choose steps or scenarios not to run using -k and -K flags.
    • Setting defaults to simplify use
